purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of durable workflows in TypeScript applications
principle: Leverages TypeScript for defining workflows and PostgreSQL for ensuring durability and state management
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for easy integration into existing TypeScript projects
limitations: Primarily designed for TypeScript environments; may require additional setup for non-PostgreSQL databases
name: dbos-transact-ts
highlight: Enables lightweight and durable execution of workflows using TypeScript and PostgreSQL
